Paper.Title: FERRET: Interactive Question-Answering for Real-World Environments

Section.S: This paper describes FERRET, an interactive question-answering (Q/A) system designed to address the challenges of integrating automatic Q/A applications into real-world environments.

FERRET utilizes a novel approach to Q/A known as predictive questioning which attempts to identify the questions (and answers) that users need by analyzing how a user interacts with a system while gathering information related to a particular scenario.
